HmiP-eTRV-2.name: eTRV-2 widget for Homematic-IP
HmiP-eTRV-2.author: Michael Rossner

settings.label: GenericName
settings.description: Add generic name of item. Items with names <generic>+(_TempAct, _TempSet, _BatteryStatus, _UpdatePending, _BoostMode, _PartyMode) are required

Netatmo Rain.template:
{{config.label}}
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.rain).split(' ')[0]}}  mm

{{itemValue(config.battery)}}%
Netatmo Rain.name: Netatmo Rain
Netatmo Rain.author: mag2000
Netatmo Rain.description: Simple Widget to display rain info

Netatmo.template:
{{config.label}}
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.temperature).split(' ')[0]}}  °C
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.humidity).split(' ')[0]}}  %
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.carbondioxide).split(' ')[0]}}  ppm
{{'%.1f' | sprintf:itemValue(config.pressure).split(' ')[0]}}  mb
{{itemValue(config.battery)}}%
Netatmo.name: Netatmo
Netatmo.author: mag2000
Netatmo.description: Simple Widget to display temperature, humidity and co2 or pressure

Temp Trend.name: Temperature Trend
Temp Trend.author: mag2000

settings.label: Trend
settings.description: If the item has a value of 1 an up icon is shown, otherwise a down icon
